channel.title: AVG Anti-Spyware 7.5 Question (Repliers will be rewarded)
channel.description: Right, so I downloaded AVG Anti-Spyware 7.5 off of [url=http://www.download.com]www.download.com[/url] and got a License Code from the net. I presumed that Windows Security Center would automatically detect it as an anti-virus programme but it has not been recognised, any suggestions?

item.title: AVG Anti-Spyware 7.5 Question (Repliers will be rewarded)
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

AVG Anti-spyware is spyware and adware protection for home and office. (<-from site). Not an anti-virus.

AVG AntiVirus Free Edition can be downloaded here:
http://free.grisoft.com/doc/downloads-products/us/frt/0?prd=aff

Read full topic
item.source: AVG Anti-Spyware 7.5 Question (Repliers will be rewarded)
